title: Generate commands
description: Like all powerful Wizards I, Purrito, can create something from thin air

fields.name: +generate item
fields.value: generate a random item, with some description text to inspire a piece of loot you have found

fields.name: +generate item lite
fields.value: generate a random item, but don't print the description text

fields.name: +generate encounter
fields.value: this will start a multi stage process where I'll try and make the best encounter for your party
